metadata.title: Personal Stylist Marysia Kozlova
metadata.description: Style is something that is in each of us, and all we need to do is find it

hero.welcome: Congratulations on your journey to your style!

about-me.title: About Me
about-me.first-text: Hello! My name is Marysia and I am your personal stylist.
about-me.second-text: I have been working in the beauty industry for over 10 years, with countless shoots and an incredible number of satisfied clients.
about-me.third-text: As a makeup artist, I have gained extensive experience working with women, which I am very proud of.

quote.title: Style is something that exists within each of us, and all we need to do is find it.
quote.author: Diane von FÃ¼rstenberg

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: I help clients find their unique style and be impeccable in any situation.

Home.question: Shall I create the best version of myself?

Services.title: Services
Services.description: With a solid background in makeup artistry, I realized that I want to make women even more beautiful, so now I can offer services for any request.

NotFound.description: This page is not available, return to the main page and try again later
